main event: An ex US Air Force pilot observed a flame-like object descending vertically and then moving horizontally at a high rate of speed on February 16, 1961.
interesting points: The object was described as having no smoke or exhaust,The observer compared the brilliance of the object to burning magnesium,The sighting lasted for about 5 minutes,The object was traveling low in a flat trajectory from east to west,The Bangor Daily News reported numerous sightings of the object on the same night across different locations.
